TopicTitle: Suggestion: Inspect Part Option in VAB and R&D

Articles.Content:
While in in the vehicle Assembly Building or Research & Development facilities, it would be nice if there was an inspect option to display a 3D model of the part, which you could rotate on all axis & zoom in/out on. Sometimes I feel like the small 2D picture doesn't do enough justice for the amazingly detailed parts that Kerbal Space Program 2 has.

Just a small Quality of Life feature that I thought would be cool.
